msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! I have in my house too!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And with your custom DIY design, your sense of style really comes through, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, cool! I have too, but yours is way different.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think yours is the same DIY thing as mine, but the feel is different. It looks great, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! Hey, I've got in my place too!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You know, I get the feeling you and I have the same sense of style.
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />! I have one too!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Mine's a little different though. Did you customize yours? I love how awesomely unique yours feels!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="6" />Oh cool, I have the exact same !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Heh heh, having the same thing as you is a little awkward, .
